# uptime_integration_webhook (Resource)

Webhook integration resource. Import using the integration ID: `terraform import uptime_integration_webhook.example 123`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptime_integration_webhook" "example" {
  name                = "My Webhook Integration"
  postback_url        = "https://example.com/webhook"
  headers             = jsonencode({ "Authorization" = "Bearer token" })
  use_legacy_payload  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `postback_url` (String, Sensitive) The webhook URL to POST to

### Optional

- `contact_groups` (Set of String) List of contact group names to receive notifications.
Each contact group can contain multiple contacts (email addresses, phone numbers, or integrations)
that will be notified when alerts are triggered. Defaults to ['Default'] if not specified.
Set to an empty list to disable notifications at this level and rely on parent check group notifications instead.
- `headers` (String) Custom headers to send with the webhook request (JSON format)
- `use_legacy_payload` (Boolean) Use legacy payload format

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `url` (String)
